description: I never had a guy in bed like this. But let me start from the beginning. I´ve chosen the train-station in Smichov for my hunt today. Many nice young guys there - but usually in kinda hurry. He was 21 and from a small town not far from Prague. He came here for a party with friends. And he was on a budget of 500 CZK which his mother granted him. Well, it was an easy task for me to offer him ten times this amount for a hand job. But I started with low amounts. And he agreed into a hand job for 3000 CZK and a few shooters upfront. When we arrived at the hotel I talked him into a blowjob... But would he agree to get fucked? I never had someone in bed screaming like him ;-)
title: Czech Hunter 206
